content: who doesn t love super soft yarn light as air and soft as a puffy cloud - or cotton candy but not sticky this bulky weight cowl will sit comfortably around your neck keeping you warm and cozy without weighing you down knit in the round using the most classic stitches - stockinette and 2x2 ribbing no increases or decreases just basic knit and purl stitches in the round this knits up quickly in bulky weight yarn and with it being simple stockinette put on your favorite show and enjoy you may knit items from this pattern for yourself others or to sell if selling items made from this pattern please credit me as the designer please note there is a matching beanie that you can knit find the pattern here https //www ravelry com/patterns/library/comfy-cozy-beanie 1 this project is suited for knitters who are comfortable with or who are open to learning the following skills and techniques cast-on knit purl knit in the round bind-off **yarn recommendations** lion brand yarns feels like bliss fiber content nylon 100% 109 yards/100 meters 3 5 oz/100 g or similar yarn that knits to gauge **sample used** 122 178 254 yards/112 163 232 meters 4 5 75 8 25 oz/112 163 232 g 2 2 3 balls sample size teen used 2 balls in dusk color way **knitting needles** us size 11/8 mm or size used to match gauge - circular or dpns as you prefer **notions** beginning of round marker scissors tapestry needle **gauge** 14 sts x 18 rounds over 4 /10 cm in stockinette stitch in the round **size information** child teen adult **finished measurements** circumference x height 18 25 x 9 21 75 x 11 26 25 x 13 inches/46 5 x 23 55 x 28 67 x 33 cm be sure to share your knits with me on instagram #ozzylosiknitdesigns 1 https //www ravelry com/patterns/library/comfy-cozy-beanie
